content: page 3 of chart working direction chart c one pattern repeat = 8 sts × 4 row bor see side yoke r on page 5 of chart 20sts 4sts 4sts 20sts 8sts 8sts sleeve sleeve chart d one pattern repeatt = 40 sts × 36 row see center body l on page 8 of chart chart e one pattern repeat = 8 sts × 4 row 34sts 28sts 28sts see side yoke l on page 6 of chart chart f one pattern repeat = 20 sts × 36 row back see sleeve l on page 15 of chart 8sts 6sts 40sts 6sts 8sts 19sts 8sts 8sts 19sts increace3sts every 4 row on every raglan line 3 / 5 sec 1 yoke r20 sm work r20 from r to l following front yoke sr side yoke sr back yoke sr and side yoke sr charts in order use 4 5mm/jp8 circular needle and work yoke in the round > 48 sts for each side 62 sts for front and back 220 sts total co108 using crocheted provisional cast on start chart yoke see chart page 3-6 pm for bor join to work in the round >bor is at the right of front yoke r21-50 sm work charts center yoke r - l side yoke r - l in order twice start chart yoke sr see chart page 1-2 > 92 sts for each side 106 sts for front and back 396 sts total r1 sm work r1 from r to l following front yoke sr k34 side yoke sr k20 back yoke sr k34 and sec 2 body side yoke sr k20 charts in order > it may be helpful to place a marker between each chart separate sleeves and body start chart body see chart page 7-10 start german short row for shaping the front neckline r1 sm work r1 of center body r - l sr1 rs sm work right-side r2 of front yoke sr from r to l turn work r1 of left body chart sts 1-34 sr2 ws work right-side r3 of front york sr from l to r sm place 76 sts for the sleeve on a holder work r2 from l to r following side yoke sr co17 using loop cast-on back yoke sr and side yoke sr charts in order work r1 of left body chart sts 52-59 work left-side r2 of front york sr from l to r turn work r1 of center body r - l sr3 rs work left-side r3 of front york sr from r to l work r1 of right body chart sts 1-34 work r3 from r to l following side yoke sr place 76 sts for the sleeve on a holder back yoke sr and side yoke sr charts in order sm co17 using loop cast-on work right-side r4 of front york sr from r to l turn work r1 of right body chart sts 52-59 sr4-18 continue as for sr2 3 following the charts > 282
